title: Isekai Izakaya - Koto Aitheria no Izakaya Nobu
alternative_title: 異世界居酒屋～古都アイテーリアの居酒屋のぶ～; isekai izakaya: japanese food from another world
description: The novels center on a bar called "Nobu"—located in Kyoto, Japan, but with a door that is connected to the bar in another world. The visitors include denizens of the other world, and customers seek out its excellent "Toriaezu Nama" ale and cuisine.
